item.title: Slayer Problem
item.dc:creator: @pkforlol3 pkforlol3
item.description:
@pkforlol3 wrote:

	if (type == 1615) {
		if (playerLevel[18] < 85) {
		addSkillXP(50000, 18);
					sM("You must be level 85 slayer or higher to attack this monster.");
			ResetAttackNPC();
			return false;
		}
	}

i have that for my abyssal demon and i want it to give 50000 exp, its for a test,
but if i kill it it wont give any expâ€¦ where do i have to place the addSkillXP?
